name: Chrono Blaster
description:
This is a game for #ldjam41.

You are a hired killer that has been betrayed by your contractor. 

Kill everyone and escape! 

You have a Chronoshift device that allows you to play time forward in sequences.
This is how it works:
Select an action
W (hold) = move forward
S  (hold) = move backward,
Left mouse (hold) = shoot
Space = executes the current action and every thing else in the world moves.
